summary: Three federal agencies launched programs to supplement state and local COVID-19 vaccination efforts for underserved and historically marginalized racial and ethnic groups. These programs used population data on race and ethnicity to select vaccination sites reached out to communities and offered translation services extended hours and used pop-up clinics to administer vaccines CDC exceeded its goal to administer COVID-19 vaccines to people from racial and...
title: COVID-19: Federal Efforts to Provide Vaccines to Racial and Ethnic Groups
